project_plan.name: Python-based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a Python-based quiz game that asks the user multiple-choice questions, keeps track of the user's score, and displays it at the end of the game. Questions and answers will be stored in a variable.

task.name: Define the questions and answers variable to store quiz content.
Implement the command line interface to present questions to the user.
Implement score tracking mechanism for correct answers.
Implement feedback logic to inform the user whether their answer is correct or incorrect.
Implement functionality to display the final score at the end of the game.
Write tests for each implemented feature to ensure correct functionality.
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly.
